LTDLWOCR.ot: LEGISLATIVE ACTION REPORT UPDATE: September 17, 1992 STATE/LOCALITY: Normandy, Missouri (St. Louis area) BILL NUMBER: ISSUE: Smoking Restrictions SUMMARY: SPONSOR: City of Normandy INTRO DATE: COMMITTEE: HEARING DATE: BILL COPY TO DC: LEGISLATIVE STATUS: The City of Normandy has begun informal discussions about an ordinance that would restrict smoking in city owned buildings. It has not been brought before the Council. There was a meeting last night, August 11, but topic was not discussed. Next meeting is September 8. We will have someone in attendance at that meeting. UPDATE: September 16, 1992 - There was a meeting held September 8 but this topic was not discussed. Will keep checking. UPDATE: September 17, 1992 - In talking with the City of Normandy, they have decided not to do anything at this time. They are just going to follow State Law.
